thread.title: Watch Live: Democrats Speak Out Against Education Secretary Nominee Betsy DeVos - NBC News
thread.title_full: Watch Live: Democrats Speak Out Against Education Secretary Nominee Betsy DeVos - NBC News

title: Watch Live: Democrats Speak Out Against Education Secretary Nominee Betsy DeVos - NBC News
text:
Watch Live: Democrats Speak Out Against Education Secretary Nominee Betsy DeVos 
Many Democrats, and some Republicans, are speaking on the Senate Floor on their views on Betsy DeVos, President Trump's Education Secretary Nominee. While not a filibuster, Democrats are using allowed time to make their voices heard. Previous
